statements.statement: select biid from psy.AEBBaseInformation bi where bi.biIk in ( select cuIk from( select cuik, ehPsyGroup, ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by biIk order by biDataYear desc) as rowNum from CallCenterDB.dbo.ccCustomer cu join psy.ExpectedHospital on cuIk = ehIk join psy.AEBBaseInformation on cuIk = biik and ehYear = biDataYear where cuIsTest = 0 and cuIsActive = 1 and cuik not in (select hcexIk from psy.HospitalComparisonExcludeIK) and case when cu.cuPsyStateId = 255 then cu.cuStateId else cu.cuPsyStateId end in ({stateIds}) ) i where rowNum = 1 and ehPsyGroup = {psyGroupId} ) and bi.biDataYear = {year} and bi.biStatusId = 10

select bi.biId from psy.AEBBaseInformation bi where bi.biIk in ( select cu.cuik from CallCenterDB.dbo.ccCustomer cu where cuIsTest = 0 and cuIsActive = 1 and cuik not in (select hcexIk from psy.HospitalComparisonExcludeIK) and case when cu.cuPsyStateId = 255 then cu.cuStateId else cu.cuPsyStateId end in ({stateIds}) ) and bi.biDataYear = {year} and bi.biStatusId = 10

select biid from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by bi.biIk order by bi.biDataYear desc) as rowNum, bi.biId from psy.AEBBaseInformation bi where bi.biIk in ( select cu.cuik from CallCenterDB.dbo.ccCustomer cu where cuIsTest = 0 and cuIsActive = 1 and cuik not in (select hcexIk from psy.HospitalComparisonExcludeIK) and case when cu.cuPsyStateId = 255 then cu.cuStateId else cu.cuPsyStateId end in ({stateIds}) ) and bi.biDataYear <= {year} and bi.biStatusId = 10 ) a where a.rowNum = 1
